00091         {

00093             mbrMember.SLastName = txt_lastName.Text;

00104             mbrMember.SMedical_allergies = txt_allergies.Text;
00105             mbrMember.SMedical_doctor_name = txt_doctor_name.Text;
00106             mbrMember.SMedical_notes = txt_medical_notes.Text;
00107             mbrMember.SMedical_phone = txt_doctor_phone.Text;
00108             mbrMember.SMemberNumber = txt_membernum.Text;
00109             mbrMember.SPayment_method = cmb_payment.Text;
00110             mbrMember.SPicture = "none";
00111             mbrMember.SPostalcode = txt_pc.Text;
00112             mbrMember.SType = cmb_type.Text;
00113             mbrMember.SEmail = txt_email.Text;
00114 
00115             if (mbrMember.IId_member == 0)
00116             {
00117                 MessageBox.Show("Saving");
00118                 mbrMember.bSave();
00119             }
00120             else
00121                 mbrMember.bUpdate();
